company_commercial_names: stiftung solidarität mit der welt | solidarität mit der welt | sdw
short_description: stiftung solidarität mit der welt is a ngo based in zurich, switzerland.
long_description: damit in afrika, asien und lateinamerika die menschen im eigenen land eine chance haben, helfen wir ihnen, ihre eigene lebenssituation selbständig zu verbessern. haben sie interesse die zeit sinnvoll und menschlich bereichernd zu investieren, dann kontaktieren sie uns.
generated_description: solidarity third world (solidarität dritte welt) is a non-profit organization based in zurich, switzerland. the organization focuses on supporting development projects in africa, asia, and latin america, particularly in countries such as colombia, togo, and madagascar. sdw collaborates with volunteers through 16 regional committees to provide access to education, vocational training, ecological farming, and basic medical care. the organization ensures that funds are directly allocated to projects to maximize their impact and operates with mechanisms to prevent corruption. sdw supports development projects from swiss religious organizations and aims to empower local communities to improve their own living conditions.
